# Japanese Lexical Graph - Scientific Evaluation Questionnaire

## Overview
This questionnaire is designed for Japanese scientists and researchers to evaluate the Japanese Lexical Graph application. The evaluation focuses on technical aspects, usability, educational value, and research potential of the system.

## Demographics and Background

### 1. Professional Information
- **Field of Research**: What is your primary field of research?
  - [ ] Linguistics
  - [ ] Computational Linguistics
  - [ ] Natural Language Processing
  - [ ] Japanese Language Education
  - [ ] Cognitive Science
  - [ ] Computer Science
  - [ ] Other: _______________

- **Research Experience**: How many years have you been conducting research?
  - [ ] 0-2 years
  - [ ] 3-5 years
  - [ ] 6-10 years
  - [ ] 11-15 years
  - [ ] 15+ years

- **Japanese Language Expertise**: What is your level of expertise in Japanese linguistics?
  - [ ] Beginner
  - [ ] Intermediate
  - [ ] Advanced
  - [ ] Expert/Researcher

## Technical Evaluation

### 2. Graph Visualization and Navigation

**2.1 3D Visualization Quality**
- How would you rate the clarity of the 3D graph visualization?
  - [ ] Excellent (5)
  - [ ] Good (4)
  - [ ] Satisfactory (3)
  - [ ] Poor (2)
  - [ ] Very Poor (1)

**2.2 Navigation Ease**
- How intuitive is the navigation system (mouse/touch controls)?
  - [ ] Very intuitive
  - [ ] Somewhat intuitive
  - [ ] Neutral
  - [ ] Somewhat difficult
  - [ ] Very difficult

**2.3 Performance**
- How would you rate the application's performance with large datasets?
  - [ ] Excellent
  - [ ] Good
  - [ ] Satisfactory
  - [ ] Poor
  - [ ] Very Poor

### 3. Data Quality and Accuracy

**3.1 Lexical Data Accuracy**
- How accurate do you find the Japanese lexical relationships in the graph?
  - [ ] Highly accurate
  - [ ] Mostly accurate
  - [ ] Somewhat accurate
  - [ ] Inaccurate
  - [ ] Very inaccurate

**3.2 Data Coverage**
- How comprehensive is the coverage of Japanese vocabulary?
  - [ ] Very comprehensive
  - [ ] Comprehensive
  - [ ] Moderately comprehensive
  - [ ] Limited
  - [ ] Very limited

**3.3 Relationship Quality**
- How meaningful are the semantic relationships between words?
  - [ ] Very meaningful
  - [ ] Meaningful
  - [ ] Somewhat meaningful
  - [ ] Not very meaningful
  - [ ] Not meaningful at all
